'''Hwenti''' was a term used by some [[Avari]] to describe themselves. It is unknown if the name "Hwenti" was applied to a particular group of Avari specifically or to all Avari as a whole. 

==Etymology==
It is an [[Avarin]] word meaning "the People". It derives from [[Primitive Quendian]] ''[[kwende|kwendÄ«]]''.<ref name=Author>{{WJ|Author}}, Note 9, p. 410</ref> Apparently this word did not change much except for a consonant shift analogous to the Germanic Great Consonant Shifts also known as the Grimm's laws.
